Package controllers

Class WatchAndCancelOrdersController

java.lang.Object
controllers.WatchAndCancelOrdersController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAware
public class WatchAndCancelOrdersController extends Object implements ClientAware
Controller for the "My Reservations" screen. Displays a table of upcoming reservations for the subscriber, and allows cancellation of individual orders.

    • WatchAndCancelOrdersController

      public WatchAndCancelOrdersController()

  • Method Details

    • defineTable

      public void defineTable()
      Called once after setClient(). Initializes the table columns, requests the subscriber's orders from the server, and adds a "Cancel" button to each row.

    • displayOrders

      public void displayOrders(ArrayList<Order> orders)
      Called by ClientController when the server responds with the list of orders. Fills the table with the received list.
      Parameters:
      orders - a list of Order objects to display

    • setClient

      public void setClient(ClientController client)
      Stores the ClientController reference for communication with the server.
      Specified by:
      setClient in interface ClientAware
      Parameters:
      client - the active ClientController
